类 MapFile.Writer

正在封闭类：
MapFile
public static class MapFile.Writer
extends Object
implements Closeable

Writes a new map.

append

public void append(WritableComparable key,
                   Writable val)
            throws IOException
Append a key/value pair to the map. The key must be greater or equal to the previous key added to the map.
